alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:27AM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson and Coastal Wakulla Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Water levels will rise quickly leading to high tide around 2 pm on Tuesday. Water levels of 3 to 4 feet above normally dry ground are expected with isolated maximum values near 5 feet possible, especially if the strongest winds occur around high tide. This will result in moderate flooding of low lying coastal communities like Mashes Sands Beach, Panacea, Spring Creek, and Saint Marks. Numerous roads will flood and non- elevated structures will be prone to inundation along the immediate coast.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
